title: Big Five trait of conscientiousness - application

content.question: Lynne was laid off from her job due to difficulties in completing tasks, planning ahead, and following company rules. She is most likely low in which of the following Big Five personality traits?

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
